meta.title: Inoculation of Rice with Different Pathogens: Sheath Blight (Rhizoctonia solani), Damping off Disease (Pythium graminicola) and Barley Powdery Mildew (Blumeria graminis f. sp. hordei)

steps.notes: Injected intraperitoneally.

meta.title: Detection of Reactive Oxygen Species in Oryza sativa L. (Rice)
Trypsin Sensitivity Assay to Study the Folding Status of Proteins

steps.notes: Administered at E9.
Used for lysis of RBCs from total dTomato BM.
For enzymatic digestion of testis-resident leukocytes.
For embedding samples before cryostat sectioning.
To assess DNA synthesis as a readout for proliferation.

meta.title: Formaldehyde Fixation of Extracellular Matrix Protein

steps.notes: Grow Psav DAPP-PG 722 in LB broth.
Resuspend in sterile deionized water.
Infiltrate into the mesophyll of tobacco leaves.
Monitor fluorescence intensities at Ex. = 335 nm, Em. = 505 nm.

meta.title: Bacterial Intracellular Sodium Ion Measurement using CoroNa Green

steps.notes: Injected into planarians.

meta.title: In vitro Cell Wall Stress Assay for Fusarium oxysporum

steps.notes: Administer NAC in drinking water 2 weeks after tumor inoculation.
Stimulate serum-starved mECK36 cells with PDGF-BB.
Add Rac1 inhibitor to culture media 10 min before PDGF stimulation.
Wash cells 3 times with HBSS.
Incubate cells with DHE/HBSS in dark conditions.
Take images in the red channel using a microscope.

meta.title: Flow Cytometric Quantification of Fatty Acid Uptake by Mycobacterium tuberculosis in Macrophages

steps.notes: Dissect larval body walls in HL-3 solution.
Incubate body walls in 4% paraformaldehyde.
Wash three times with PBT.
Wash three times with PBS.
Mix reagents for tagging ANL-labelled proteins.

meta.title: Harvest and Culture of Mouse Peritoneal Macrophages
A Novel Task for Studying Memory of Occasional Events in Rats

steps.notes: Incubate in the dark.
Inject through tail vein microcatheter.
Analyze using Inveon Workstation Software.

meta.title: Organotypic Spinal Cord Slice Cultures and a Method to Detect Cell Proliferation in These Slices

steps.notes: Fix embryos in 4% PFA.
Wash embryos three times with wash buffer.
Incubate embryos in staining solution 1 overnight in darkness.
Incubate embryos in staining solution 2 and monitor every 10 minutes.
Inject 10,000 metacyclic promastigotes into the ear dermis.
Wash cells three times with PBS.
Read absorbance at OD 450 with a correction wavelength set at 570 nm.
Prepare cell culture media for IMR-32 cells.
Inject G418 for selection of transfected cells.
Mix puromycin for selection of transfected cells.

meta.title: Genomic Signature of Homologous Recombination Deficiency in Breast and Ovarian Cancers

steps.notes: Prepare the medium for S. cerevisiae strains.
Pellet the cells after growth.
Perform the α-amylase quantification assay.

meta.title: Expression, Purification and Crystallization of Recombinant Arabidopsis Monogalactosyldiacylglycerol Synthase (MGD1)

steps.notes: Incubate overnight with antibody-oligonucleotide complexes.

meta.title: Purification and Crystallization of Chloromuconolactone Dehalogenase ClcF from Rhodococcus opacus 1CP

steps.notes: Worms were grown at 20 °C for 50 h prior to use.
Worms were washed from NGM plates and resuspended in S Basal.
Worms were treated with mitochondrial-damaging agents.
Worms were washed three times to remove remaining drugs or dye.
Fluorescence intensities were recorded.
